languages.text: "Говори что хочешь, только нет у него за душой от нас тайн, а на пути — опасности. Верьте этому бедолаге, Лорд-капитан — я не слышу предупредительных шепотов".
"Say what you wish, but he harbours no secrets from us in his heart, while the path ahead is full of danger. Trust this poor man, Lord Captain — I do not hear any warning whispers."
languages.original_text: "Говори что хочешь, только нет у него за душой от нас тайн, а на пути — опасности. Верьте этому бедолаге, Лорд-капитан — я не слышу предупредительных шепотов".

traits.locale_text: "Say what you wish, but he harbours no secrets from us in his heart, while the path ahead is full of danger. Trust this poor man, Lord Captain — I do not hear any warning whispers."
"Say what you wish, but he harbours no secrets from us in his heart, while the path ahead is full of danger. Trust this poor man, Lord Captain — I do not hear any warning whispers."
"Say what you wish, but he harbours no secrets from us in his heart, while the path ahead is full of danger. Trust this poor man, Lord Captain — I do not hear any warning whispers."
"Say what you wish, but he harbours no secrets from us in his heart, while the path ahead is full of danger. Trust this poor man, Lord Captain — I do not hear any warning whispers."

languages.text: “你想怎么说都好，但他没有对我们隐瞒任何秘密，前方的道路充满危险。相信这个可怜人吧，舰长大人，我没有听到任何警告的低语声。”
languages.original_text: "Say what you wish, but he harbours no secrets from us in his heart, while the path ahead is full of danger. Trust this poor man, Lord Captain — I do not hear any warning whispers."

traits.locale_text: “你想怎么说都好，但他没有对我们隐瞒任何秘密，前方的道路充满危险。相信这个可怜人吧，舰长大人，我没有听到任何警告的低语声。”

languages.text: «Puede decir lo que quiera, pero no nos oculta ningún secreto y el camino que nos espera está lleno de peligros. Confíe en este pobre hombre, Lord Capitán. No oigo ningún susurro de advertencia».
languages.original_text: "Say what you wish, but he harbours no secrets from us in his heart, while the path ahead is full of danger. Trust this poor man, Lord Captain — I do not hear any warning whispers."

traits.locale_text: «Puede decir lo que quiera, pero no nos oculta ningún secreto y el camino que nos espera está lleno de peligros. Confíe en este pobre hombre, Lord Capitán. No oigo ningún susurro de advertencia».

languages.text: 「お望みどおりのことを言ってあげたいけど、彼の心はあたい達に隠し事なんてしてないわ。でも、道を進めば危険でいっぱいね。この哀れな男を信じましょう、ロード・キャプテン…警告するささやきは聞こえないわ」
languages.original_text: "Say what you wish, but he harbours no secrets from us in his heart, while the path ahead is full of danger. Trust this poor man, Lord Captain — I do not hear any warning whispers."

traits.locale_text: 「お望みどおりのことを言ってあげたいけど、彼の心はあたい達に隠し事なんてしてないわ。でも、道を進めば危険でいっぱいね。この哀れな男を信じましょう、ロード・キャプテン…警告するささやきは聞こえないわ」

languages.text: « Vous pouvez dire ce que vous voulez, mais son cœur ne renferme aucun secret et le chemin qui s'étend devant nous est rempli de dangers. Faites confiance à ce pauvre homme, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je n'entends aucun murmure d'avertissement. »
languages.original_text: "Say what you wish, but he harbours no secrets from us in his heart, while the path ahead is full of danger. Trust this poor man, Lord Captain — I do not hear any warning whispers."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez dire ce que vous voulez, mais son cœur ne renferme aucun secret et le chemin qui s'étend devant nous est rempli de dangers. Faites confiance à ce pauvre homme, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je n'entends aucun murmure d'avertissement. »

languages.text: "Ihr könnt sagen, was Ihr wollt, aber er verbirgt in seinem Herzen keine Geheimnisse vor uns, wohlgleich der Pfad vor uns voller Gefahren ist. Vertraut diesem armen Mann, Lord Captain – ich höre kein warnendes Flüstern."
languages.original_text: "Say what you wish, but he harbours no secrets from us in his heart, while the path ahead is full of danger. Trust this poor man, Lord Captain — I do not hear any warning whispers."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt sagen, was Ihr wollt, aber er verbirgt in seinem Herzen keine Geheimnisse vor uns, wohlgleich der Pfad vor uns voller Gefahren ist. Vertraut diesem armen Mann, Lord Captain – ich höre kein warnendes Flüstern."

languages.text: "İstediğini de. O bize kalbini açtı, hem de önümüzdeki yol tehlikelerle doluyken... Bu zavallı adama güvenebiliriz Lord Kaptan. Yoksa fısıldayanlarım uyarıda bulunurdu."
languages.original_text: "Say what you wish, but he harbours no secrets from us in his heart, while the path ahead is full of danger. Trust this poor man, Lord Captain — I do not hear any warning whispers."

traits.locale_text: "Ne söylerseniz söyleyin ama o, bize kalbini açtı. Hem de önümüzdeki yol tehlikelerle doluyken... Bu zavallı adama güvenebiliriz Lord Kaptan. İçimde ona karşı kötü bir his yok."
